title: Kane & Lynch Dead Man [ENG/PL] [DVD9]
description:
Description of the installation:
=======================
1.Install image in Daemon Tools or record a disc.
2.Install
3.Open disc and install from the folder support / XLiveRedist.exe
4.Play the game as an administrator in compatibility mode (to run on Win7)
5.Play
6.Create account XLive as a guest on a local (needed to save game)

1:1 copy made of the edition of the complete issue. The game does not require a crack and it works on Win7 64bit. I checked it myself and it beautifully. To start the game, install the CD manually and carefully support folder / XLiveRedist.exe to launch the game. I hope to do just fine and I wish you a nice game.
